ca1a1af8-1d1b-4eef-892b-8d92b0a89d41.Text: For the next attack against a target affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g}, that target's {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and block will be reduced by −<u>(15 + ({unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} / 2) × stacks of exploit)</u>%. This attack will have +<u>(15 + ({unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} / 2) × stacks of exploit)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Single-shot and melee attacks will do +{uip|damagebonus|d9e00160ce96479281c1abe9a26ac4e5}% critical damage.

c9d22b73-9f30-40ec-8550-00bdbfa2f8c6.Text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Alpha Strike{/g} grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} equal to <u>(number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} removed)</u> (minimum 1) until the end of combat. Stacks.

de578abd-c1e5-42da-b022-e431e335a598.Text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Alpha Strike{/g} on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

d9fe0ee9-f347-417a-9bdc-380fb74c9318.Text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +2 damage, +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.

a6b9621a-5d74-43d9-9b6e-5d3402b6550b.Text:
The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(20 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.
The target will suffer an increased {uip|criticalbonus|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}% critical chance from attackers.
Critical hits against enemies that this Operative has exposed will not count towards their attack limit this turn. This effect will not trigger from burst or area attacks. It will also not trigger if the Operative has attacked at least three times this round, including extra turns and attacks that hit multiple targets.

3269e346-5c49-4e64-b9a9-7b6033a7d11a.Text:
While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus is 10 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill are increased by {uip|StatBonus|1d6a3bacdb914699b83d564a1f22bfbc}.

651f40ee-ed3f-4d2a-9c5b-6442666e385b.Text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} targets one enemy within {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. That target immediately gains +{uip|Exploits|502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g}.

43ab4851-d540-43eb-b72d-49d1df84a3f8.Text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} even on enemies which are out of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. They will also gain a {uip|dodgebonus|8341c8a0c79c4982a8cef0bbd2d1a2a2}% increase to their dodge chance.

e2921f84-b672-427f-95e9-d0acf6d9bbf2.Text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} suffers −{uip|DamageReduction|4c56ec5c399f4c70815dd5596b0e7b83}% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from enemies affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g}.

1973b25f-e5c3-4428-a497-510eea0ccb7f.Text:
The Operative gains +25% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} efficiency (if in cover), +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and a 75% recoil reduction.
This effect lasts until the Operative moves. Does not stack.

b3653ca6-4344-436a-ac27-14e575b890d2.Text: If an enemy affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} within 10 cells from the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks the Operative or their ally, that enemy suffers +1 additional exploit.

4670a313-ac58-4c74-a789-b4249ff00ece.Text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} has not moved this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal +{uip|DamageBonus|9a0e7e64902e491baa29d60469eae188} more damage with {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks for every 3 cells between them and the target and gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill} Ballistic Skill{/g}. These bonuses do not stack and last until the Operative moves.

5181bb6a-f7e8-4866-aa8d-2bd9dcf62fb6.Text: On their first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} randomly distributes the same number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} as when using {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analyse Enemies{/g} among all enemies in a 10-cell radius around the Operative. At the start of each of the Operative's subsequent turns, they distribute half as many exploits (half the base amount) among all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the Operative.

e2c9d44f-e79d-4979-888b-21522ab0a7ad.Text:
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks an enemy that is at 50% or higher {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, that attack deals +{uip|DamageBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that enemy with a +{uip|CriticalBonus|ed9d1434d0fd41e2a382a2efe0a2018a}% increased critical chance.
Upon killing a target who the Operative has marked with {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, +1 AP is restored and the cooldown for {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g} is reset.
